better-fishing.config.title: Better Fishing Configuration
better-fishing.config.tooltip.auto_fishi: Automatically detect fish bites and pull up the rod
better-fishing.config.tooltip.rod_protec: Stop fishing when rod durability is below 10
better-fishing.config.tooltip.block_junk: Automatically filter and discard unwanted fishing items
better-fishing.config.tooltip.pull_up:
Delay in ticks before pulling up after detecting a bite
Recommended: 5-10 ticks
1 tick = 1/20 second = 0.05 seconds
better-fishing.config.tooltip.release:
Delay in ticks before recasting after pulling up
Recommended: 10-50 ticks
Too short may cause casting to fail
better-fishing.config.tooltip.block_list:
Enter item IDs to automatically discard
Format: minecraft:cod, minecraft:salmon
Separate multiple items with commas
